summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控件创建一个选择框。Use the control to create a selection box. 指定项列表控件中放置 HTML` 每个项都由对象。Each item is represented by a object. 若要指定每个项在控件中显示的文本，可以设置属性的项或直接将文本的开始和结束之间`To specify the text that is displayed for each item in the control, you can set the property of the item, or simply place text between the opening and closing ` 通过设置项的属性，您可以将值与关联不同于文本的项。By setting the property of the item, you can associate a value with the item that is different from the text. 若要从列表中选择某个项，默认情况下，设置到该项目的属性`true`。To select an item from the list by default, set the property of the item to `true`. 您可以控制外观和行为通过设置控件和属性。You can control the appearance and behavior of the control by setting the and properties. 属性指定控件的高度 （以行为单位）。The property specifies the height (in rows) of the control. 属性指定多个项是否可以同时选择中控件。The property specifies whether more than one item can be concurrently selected in the control. 默认情况下，控件将显示为下拉列表框。By default, the control is displayed as a drop-down list box. 如果允许多重选择 (通过设置属性设置为`true`) 或指定大于一个行的高度 (通过设置属性的值大于`1`)，控件将显示为列表框。If you allow multiple selections (by setting the property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box. 若要确定选定的项中的单选控制，请使用属性来获取所选的项的索引。To determine the selected item in a single-selection control, use the property to get the index of the selected item. 然后可以使用此值检索从项集合。You can then use this value to retrieve the item from the collection. 若要确定选定的项目从循环访问控件，它允许多项选择，集合并测试的每个项的属性。To determine the selected items from an control that allows multiple selections, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item. 类提供了两个属性，以支持数据绑定。The class provides two properties to support data binding. 若要将数据绑定到任何对象，它实现接口 (如， ，和)，或界面，请使用属性来指定要绑定到数据源。To bind data to any object that implements the interface (such as , , and ), or the interface, use the property to specify the data source to bind to. 当您将设置属性时，必须手动编写代码来执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding. 若要自动绑定控制到数据源表示数据源控件，使用属性并将其值设置为要使用的数据源控件的属性。To automatically bind an control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the property and set its value to the property of the data source control to use. 当您将设置属性，控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you set the property, the control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 因此，不需要显式调用方法。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method. 此外可以指定数据源中的哪些字段绑定到并通过设置控件中的项的属性和属性，分别。You can also specify which fields in the data source bind to the and properties of an item in the control by setting the and properties, respectively. 如果数据源包含多个数据源，使用属性来指定要绑定到控件的特定源。If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如，如果你有对象具有多个表，必须指定要绑定到与该控件的表属性。For example, if you have a object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control with the property. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建通过显式声明在控件中显示的项的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control by explicitly declaring the items that appear in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[htmlselect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/htmlselect/CS/htmlselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[htmlselect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/htmlselect/VB/htmlselectvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建通过将控件绑定到数据源的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control by binding the control to a data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectDataSource/CS/htmlselectdatasourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectDataSource/VB/htmlselectdatasourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的数据源控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data source for an control. 属性设置为属性的控件，用于检索数据。The property is set to the property of the control used to retrieve the data. 加载页面时，控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件和数据显示给用户。When the page is loaded, the control automatically binds to the data source specified by the control and the data is displayed to the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelect.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelect.DataSourceID/CS/htmlselect.datasourceidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelect.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelect.DataSourceID/VB/htmlselect.datasourceidvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要绑定到数据源控件。Use the property to specify the data source to bind to the control. 数据源必须实现的集合接口 (如， ，或) 或接口。A data source must be a collection that implements either the interface (such as , , or ) or the interface. 当您将设置属性时，必须手动编写代码来执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 如果数据源包含多个集的数据，如对象具有多个表，请使用属性来指定要绑定到控件的数据集。If the data source contains multiple sets of data, such as a object with multiple tables, use the property to specify which data set to bind to the control. 您可以指定哪些字段从数据源绑定到并通过设置控件中每个项的属性和属性，分别。You can specify which fields from the data source to bind to the and properties of each item in the control by setting the and properties, respectively. 或者，可以使用属性自动绑定到数据源控件所表示的数据源。Alternately, you can use the property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control. 当您将设置属性，数据列表控件自动将绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you set the property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 不需要编写代码显式调用方法。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 如果两个指定值属性和属性，则 ASP.NET 将无法解析数据源和一个引发异常。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到的信息源控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the source of information to bind to the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要绑定到数据源中的哪个字段控件中每个项的属性。Use the property to specify which field from the data source to bind to the property of each item in the control. 此属性通常用于提供的值属性的值与不同属性。This property is commonly used to provide a value for the property that differs from the value of the property. 类提供两个属性用于指定要绑定到数据源。The class provides two properties for specifying the data source to bind to. 属性，可将绑定实现的任何集合的控件或接口 (如， ，或)。The property allows you to bind an control to any collection that implements the or interfaces (such as , , or ). 当你使用属性指定数据源，必须显式调用方法以将控件绑定并将其到数据源的属性。When you use the property to specify the data source, you must explicitly call the method to bind the control and its property to the data source. 属性，可将绑定表示的数据源的数据源控件的控件。The property allows you to bind an control to a data source control that represents a data source. 当你使用属性指定数据源控件并将其属性自动绑定到数据源控件。When you use the property to specify the data source, the control and its property automatically bind to the data source control. 因此，不需要显式调用方法。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用并属性来指定要绑定到数据源中的字段属性中的每项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to specify the field from the data source to bind to the property of each item in the control. span.span: Restores the control's view state information from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 控件的视图状态存储为对象。The control's view state is stored as a object. 字段对象包含控件的基本视图状态。The field of the object holds the control's base view state. 字段对象持有集合由属性。The field of the object holds the collection represented by the property. 字段对象包含由所选的索引属性。The field of the object holds the selected indices represented by the property. 方法调用基类的方法还原控件的基本视图状态。The method calls the base class's method to restore the control's base view state. 方法主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便控件的视图状态正确的管理。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's view state is properly managed.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

summary.span: 这使你可以为事件提供自定义处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时中的选定的项控件的各次发送到服务器的更改。The event is raised when the selected items in the control change between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 仅当用户启动的发送到服务器，例如单击提交按钮时，引发此事件。This event is raised only when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a Submit button. 此事件不会导致发布到要发生的服务器。This event does not cause a post to the server to occur. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须具有启用视图状态事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 可以使用此事件上执行数据验证控制当用户更改控件中的选定内容。You can use this event to perform data validation on the control when the user changes the selection in the control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of the control. 事件处理程序确定所选的项是否为相互兼容。The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectOnServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectOnServerChange/CS/htmlselectonserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectOnServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectOnServerChange/VB/htmlselectonserverchangevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectServerChange/CS/htmlselectserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectServerChange/VB/htmlselectserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

span.para: 重写时方法在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用属性来确定控件是否需要调用方法绑定到其指定的数据源。The control uses the property to determine whether the control needs to call the method to bind to its specified data source. 每次`set`访问器调用任一， ，或属性来更改后的数据源方法被调用时，ASP.NET 会自动设置的值属性设置为`true`。Each time the `set` accessor is called on either the , , or property to change the data source after the method has already been called, ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the property to `true`. 值属性也设置为`true`时调用方法。The value of the property is also set to `true` when the method is invoked. ASP.NET 会自动设置的值属性设置为`false`后立即调用方法。ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the property to `false` immediately after the method has been called.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的选定项的序号索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the ordinal index of the selected item in an control.

value.span: 控件中的选定项的序号索引。

span.span: The ordinal index of the selected item in an control.

value.span: 值 指示未选择任何项。

span.span: A value of indicates that no item is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常用于确定单选中的选定项的索引控件。The property is commonly used to determine the index of the selected item in a single-selection control. 然后可以使用此索引来检索中的项集合。This index can then be used to retrieve the item from the collection. 如果属性设置为`true`，，该值指示是否可以同时选择多个项，属性包含的第一个选定项的索引。If the property is set to `true`, indicating that multiple items can be concurrently selected, the property contains the index of the first selected item. 若要确定选定的项目从循环访问控件，它允许多个同时进行选择，集合并测试的每个项的属性。To determine the selected items from an control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item. > [!CAUTION] > 很可能有未选择任何项。It is possible to have no item selected. 如果未不选择任何项，属性包含值为`-1`。If no item is selected, the property contains a value of `-1`. 当首次加载页面和默认情况下不选择项通常会发生这种情况。This commonly occurs when the page first loads and an item is not selected by default. 提供代码来测试此值在引用中的项之前集合。Provide code to test this value before referencing the item in the collection. 否则，如果索引超出了集合的范围是引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown if the index is out of the range of the collection. 默认情况下，控件将显示为下拉列表框。By default, the control is displayed as a drop-down list box. 如果允许多重选择 (通过设置属性设置为`true`) 或指定大于一个行的高度 (通过设置属性的值大于`1`)，控件将显示为列表框。If you allow multiple selections (by setting the property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box. 如果显示一个下拉列表框，则始终选择项。If a drop-down list box is displayed, an item is always selected. 如果显示一个列表框，则可以通过设置以编程方式清除所有项的选定项属性设置为`-1`。If a list box is displayed, you can programmatically clear the selection from all items by setting the property to `-1`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定索引中的选定项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the selected item in the control. 该索引随后用于检索中的选定的项集合。The index is then used to retrieve the selected item from the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectSingleSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectSingleSelect/CS/htmlselectsingleselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectSingleSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectSingleSelect/VB/htmlselectsingleselectvb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 如果控件中未选定任何项，则返回 。

span.span: If no item is selected in the control, is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常用于获取所引用的项的值属性。The property is commonly used to get the value of the item referenced by the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果控件中未选定任何项，则返回 。If no item is selected in the control, is returned. 如果此属性设置为一个值，属性更新为包含该值的列表中的第一项的索引。If you set this property to a value, the property is updated with the index of the first item in the list that contains that value. 如果不找到任何匹配的值，则属性保留不变。If no matching value is found, the property is left unchanged. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性获取的值中的选定项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to get the value of the selected item in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectSingleSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectSingleSelect/CS/htmlselectsingleselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectSingleSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectSingleSelect/VB/htmlselectsingleselectvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 属性被设置为大于 控件中的项数或小于 的项。

span.span: The property was set to an item greater than the number of items in the control or less than .
